docs.title: File Encryptor Documentation
docs.text: A secure file encryption/decryption tool with both CLI and GUI interfaces.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• 🔒 Military-grade Fernet symmetric encryption
  • 📁 Encrypt/decrypt individual files or entire directories
  • 📊 Progress visualization with tqdm
  • 🖥️ Optional PyQt5 GUI interface
  • 🔄 Recursive directory processing
  • 🔑 Secure key management

docs.title: API Reference
docs.text: Developer documentation for the File Encryptor package.

docs.title: encryptor.core.crypto
docs.text:
```python class CryptoManager: """Handles encryption/decryption operations."""

def __init__(self, key: Optional[bytes] = None):
    """Initialize with optional key."""

def encrypt_data(self, data: bytes) -> bytes:
    """Encrypt raw bytes data."""

def decrypt_data(self, encrypted_data: bytes) -> bytes:
    """Decrypt encrypted bytes data."""

def save_key(self, key_file: Union[str, Path]):
    """Save the encryption key to a file."""

@classmethod
def load_key(cls, key_file: Union[str, Path]):
    """Load encryption key from a file."""

docs.title: 🧰 Command-Line Interface (CLI) Usage
docs.text: The CLI allows you to encrypt and decrypt files directly from the terminal.

docs.title: 🧰 Graphic-user Interface (GUI) Usage
docs.text: The GUI provides a user-friendly interface for file encryption.
